resources.string:
Through each generation we’ve adapted and evolved, always keeping our sights set on creating the highest quality olive oil, while balancing our time-honored traditions with new innovative techniques.

 We’re passionate, even obsessive, about environmental sustainability, and we’re constantly looking to find ways to decrease our footprint on mother earth.

 We also share a strong sense of community with our customers, fellow farmers, and our beloved Santa Rosa neighbors who have embraced our business for many decades. Our high ethical standards and well-defined values are central to everything we do.

Don’t forget about using the coupon codes you’ll find around our website. They change frequently, but are always a great bargain… if we do say so ourselves. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out. We love helping our customers.
